flawed_nl_solution:
The number of truck stamps is 11 + 9 = <<11+9=20>>20.
The number of rose stamps is 20 − 13 = <<20-13=12>>12.
Bella bought 11 + 20 + 12 = <<11+20+12=43>>43 stamps in all.
#### 43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
